topic.title: &systemd; timer: Catching up on missed runs

abstract.para: With &systemd; timers, you can make leeway for missed timer events.

topic.para: If a &systemd; timer was inactive or the system was off during the expected execution time, missed events can optionally be triggered immediately when the timer is activated again. To enable this, add the configuration option Persistent=true to the [Timer] section:
